companyName: Ehrenworth Law, PLLC - Newport News, VA
description:
Were you charged with a serious crime? With prosecutors and law enforcement doing everything they can to secure a conviction, it is important that you have help from a dependable Newport News criminal defense lawyer. Call Ehrenworth Law, PLLC today for an advocate with decades of experience and a former position as a prosecutor. You do not have to fight the charges alone.

Ehrenworth Law, PLLC offers free consultations, so you can get started on building an effective defense strategy today. Whether you were charged with DUI, a drug crime, or a violent offense, count on their firm to give you a clear picture of what to expect and how to proceed. Their firm also offers help with family law and estate planning concerns. Get started today by calling for a consultation.
